about_the_game:
Where can I find what in the game? The answer is simple! With the interactive maps you can find exactly what you are looking for! Be it a wild animal during the hunt or an important point to solve the next questline. Take advantage of the simplicity of the interactive maps and enjoy your game without the hassle of searching!

Access
The Map Pack can be found in the game’s install directory within the folder "Map Pack Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Medieval Dynasty) after the “Map Pack” DLC has finished downloading.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
